Appointment.description: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s)

OperationOutcome.description: Information about the success/failure of an action

_pretty.name: _pretty

_elements.name: _elements
_elements.description: Ask for a particular set of elements to be returned

_summary.description: Return only portions of resources, based on pre-defined levels

_content.name: _content

_in.name: _in

_lastUpdated.name: _lastUpdated

_query.name: _query

actor.name: actor
actor.description: Any one of the individuals participating in the appointment

appointment-type.name: appointment-type
appointment-type.description: The style of appointment or patient that has been booked in the slot (not service type)

identifier.name: identifier
identifier.description: Business Identifier for research subject in a study

location.name: location
location.description: A location, where the resource is found

part-status.name: part-status
part-status.description: The Participation status of the subject, or other participant on the appointment. Can be used to locate participants that have not responded to meeting requests.

practitioner.name: practitioner
practitioner.description: One of the individuals of the appointment is this practitioner

reason-code.name: reason-code
reason-code.description: Coded reason this appointment is scheduled

reason-reference.name: reason-reference
reason-reference.description: Reason the appointment is to take place (resource)

service-category.name: service-category
service-category.description: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment

service-type.name: service-type
service-type.description: The specific service that is to be performed during this appointment

slot.name: slot
slot.description: The slots that this appointment is filling

specialty.name: specialty
specialty.description: The specialty of a practitioner that would be required to perform the service requested in this appointment

status.name: status
status.description: candidate | eligible | follow-up | ineligible | not-registered | off-study | on-study | on-study-intervention | on-study-observation | pending-on-study | potential-candidate | screening | withdrawn

tags.name: Appointment
tags.description: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s)
